verses.verse: ([A Psalm of] Praise, of David.) I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> Thee, my <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H4428>King;<s%> And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> Thee, And I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
<S%H1419>Great<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3966>highly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised;<s%> And His <S%H1420>greatness<s%> is <S%H369>unsearchable.<s%> <S%H2714><s%>
One <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall <S%H9576>praise<s%> Thy <S%H4639>works<s%> to <S%H1755>another,<s%> And shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> Thy <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>acts.<s%>
On the <S%H9202>glorious<s%> <S%H1926>splendor<s%> of Thy <S%H1935>majesty,<s%> And on Thy <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>works,<s%> I will <S%H7878>meditate.<s%>
And men shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H5807>power<s%> of Thine <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H3372>acts;<s%> And I will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of Thy <S%H1420>greatness.<s%>

They shall <S%H5042>eagerly<s%> <S%H5042>utter<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of Thine <S%H7227>abundant<s%> <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> And shall <S%H7442>shout<s%> <S%H7442>joyfully<s%> of Thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful;<s%> <S%H750>Slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3605>all,<s%> And His <S%H7356>mercies<s%> are <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4639>works.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> Thy <S%H4639>works<s%> shall <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And Thy <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> Thee.
They shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> of the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of Thy <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> And <S%H1696>talk<s%> of Thy <S%H1369>power;<s%>

To <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> Thy <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>acts,<s%> And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H1926>majesty<s%> of Thy <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
Thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> And Thy <S%H4475>dominion<s%> [endures] throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5564>sustains<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H5307>fall,<s%> And <S%H2210>raises<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> who are <S%H3721>bowed<s%> <S%H3721>down.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7663>look<s%> to Thee, And Thou dost <S%H5414>give<s%> them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>time.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H6605>open<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> And dost <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>thing.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H2623>kind<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4639>deeds.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Him, To <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Him in <S%H571>truth.<s%>
He will <S%H6213>fulfill<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him; He will also <S%H8085>hear<s%> their <S%H7775>cry<s%> and will <S%H3467>save<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H157>love<s%> Him; But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> He will <S%H8045>destroy.<s%>

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
